Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Doreen Moreno "Doreen Moreno"
Reviews.Content: Really like this camera. It easy to use the pictures and videos are beautiful, perfect size for travel. It came with all the extras so I didn't need to purchase any thing extra. Good Sony support for any questions I needed to know. I would  recommend this camera to a friend

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture breathtaking images, get close with 20x zoom.
Image stabilization reduces blur.
Crisp, beautiful HD videos.
Share instantly with built-in Wi-Fi.
Big-time battery life; Captures up to 500 photos on a single charge.
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-WX300/W 18.2 MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (White) + Sony 16GB SDHC Memory Card + Sony Camera Case + Accessory Kit
